pr_title: Fetch Columns and DataType from ResultSet

timeline.bodyText: Would it be better to model   private final JsonNode _columnDataTypesArray; as a Schema object?
timeline.author: mayankshriv

replies.bodyText:
It is just an array of strings so does it make sense to create an object for it?
We are anyways not doing it anywhere in java client and using JsonNode.
replies.author: KKcorps

replies.bodyText: I can create a seperate PR though for replacing all instances of JsonNode with proper classes.
replies.author: KKcorps
